titleStmt.title: The true trial and turning of a sinner. Or, three plaine and profitable sermons teaching the search and triall of our waies, repentance of sinne, and true turning vnto God. The summe whereof was preached at Feuersham in Kent Aug. 3. 1606. By Thomas Tuke.
titleStmt.author: Tuke, Thomas, d. 1657.

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: Sermons preached at Feuersham in Kent.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
